document_data.mainbody:
tamkk was a male bugbear who ran the kitchen in the Coliseum of Maerimydra for Kurgoth Hellspawn.
A bugbear of some stature, Stamkk was armed with an array of cleavers and kitchen knives.
Stamkk was an especially cowardly bugbear for his size, despite his outward appearance as a bully he was not above fleeing as soon as he felt threatened.
A passable chef, Stamkk could run a kitchen well enough to feed numerous fire giants. 
As the boss of a large kitchen, Stamkk had access to all manner of kitchen implements and utensils.
Stamkk was a brutal with the goblins who helped him run his kitchen but conversely they would stick with the bugbear wherever he ran.
In 1372 DR, the half-fiend fire giant Kurgoth Hellspawn invaded Maerimydra and made the Coliseum (Maerimydra) there his home. To feed his giant-sized appetite, Kurgoth conscripted Stamkk and a few goblins to prepare meals for him.
